data.title: Bitcoin, Binance Coin, Avalanche, Cosmos ATOM Daily Price Analyses –  18 February Roundup
data.text: TL;DR Breakdown The global crypto market has seen no positive change in the past 24 hours, as it lost 1.69%. Bitcoin hasn't turned bullish yet; it lost 1.34% in the past 24 hours.

data.title: Hopefully, Bitcoin Will Increase Incentive For Cooperation
data.text: As Western powers attempt to stifle free speech and protest, Bitcoin may be our only hope to incentivize cooperation.
